title: "Music prescribed as medicine in care homes to help dementia sufferers"
excerpt: "The idea is now being piloted in a care home after trials suggested it reduced the heart rate in anxious dementia sufferers by up to a quarter. The music is being made available free to families and care providers at what can be a lonely time of year."
